title: Device Reported as Lost or Stolen
description:
The scenario demonstrates and generates a demo alert for the Alert Type 'Lost / Stolen'.
This use-case deals with containment and investigation procedures once the user reports a lost or stolen device using email.
-	Create FortiSOAR Alert using the email details received from end-user
-	Get Asset details from ServiceNow
-	Create Asset in FortiSOAR
-	Retrieve User and Manager details from Active Directory
-	Send the Device confirmation detail to the End User and his/her Manager
-	Isolate Device using Fortinet FortiEDR
-	Send Email to IT and HR team 
-	Close the Alert in FortiSOAR

Steps.name: Device was reported as lost or stolen
Steps.preCreateMessage: Creating demo record for device reported as lost or stolen
